fields.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.instructions:
1. Cook pasta.
2. Fry pancetta.
3. Mix eggs and cheese.
4. Combine all ingredients.

fields.name: Chicken Teriyaki
fields.description: A popular Japanese dish with grilled chicken glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar until the sugar dissolves.
2. Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat.
3. Cook chicken thighs until golden brown on both sides.
4. Pour the sauce over the chicken and let it simmer until the sauce thickens.
5. Garnish with chopped green onion and sesame seeds before serving.

fields.name: Pad Thai
fields.description: A classic Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, then drain.
2. In a small bowl, mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar.
3. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
4. Add shrimp and tofu, and cook until shrimp are pink.
5. Push everything to the side and scramble the eggs in the pan.
6. Add noodles and sauce mixture, tossing to combine.
7. Stir in bean sprouts and cook for another minute.
8. Serve with crushed peanuts, green onions, lime wedges, and cilantro.

fields.name: Beef Bulgogi
fields.description: A Korean dish made with marinated beef, grilled or stir-fried to perfection.
fields.instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, sesame seeds, onion, green onions, garlic, ginger, and black pepper.
2. Add beef slices to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
3. Heat a pan over high heat and cook the marinated beef until fully cooked and caramelized.
4. Serve with rice and side dishes.

fields.name: Tom Yum Soup
fields.description: A spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and aromatic herbs.
fields.instructions:
1. In a pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Add lemongrass, lime leaves, and galangal.
2. Simmer for 5 minutes to release the flavors.
3. Add shrimp and mushrooms, cooking until shrimp are pink.
4. Stir in fish sauce, lime juice, and chilies.
5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

fields.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
fields.description: A Chinese dish with crispy pork in a tangy sweet and sour sauce, mixed with pineapple and bell peppers.
ingredients: 500g pork tenderloin - cut into bite-sized pieces
1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water
fields.instructions:
1. Coat pork pieces in beaten egg, then cornstarch.
2. Heat oil in a pan and fry pork until golden and crispy.
3. In a separate pan, combine ketchup, rice vinegar, sugar, and soy sauce. Bring to a boil.
4. Add pineapple, bell pepper, and onion, cooking until vegetables are tender.
5. Stir in the cornstarch mixture to thicken the sauce.
6. Toss the fried pork in the sauce and serve immediately.

fields.name: Butter Chicken
fields.description: A rich and creamy curry made with tender chicken pieces cooked in a spiced tomato sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Marinate the chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala for at least 1 hour.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
3. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
4. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
5. Add marinated chicken and cook until the chicken is done.
6. Stir in the heavy cream and butter, and simmer for 10 minutes.
7. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

fields.name: Chana Masala
fields.description: A popular North Indian dish made with chickpeas cooked in a spicy and tangy tomato-based sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
2. Sauté onions until golden brown.
3. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
4. Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
5. Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, coriander powder, and cumin powder. Cook for 2 minutes.
6. Add cooked chickpeas and salt, and simmer for 15 minutes.
7. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

fields.name: Paneer Tikka
fields.description: A popular vegetarian appetizer made with marinated paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cubes grilled to perfection.
fields.instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, turmeric powder, chili powder, garam masala, cumin powder, ginger-garlic paste, vegetable oil, and salt.
2. Add paneer cubes to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
3. Skewer the marinated paneer and grill until golden brown on all sides.
4. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

fields.name: Biryani
fields.description: A fragrant rice dish made with basmati rice, meat (chicken, mutton, or beef), and a blend of aromatic spices.
ingredients: Fresh mint and cilantro for garnish
1 teaspoon saffron soaked in 2 tablespoons warm milk
fields.instructions:
1. Marinate the meat in yogurt, turmeric powder, chili powder, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, and salt for at least 1 hour.
2. Cook basmati rice until 70% done and set aside.
3. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
4. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
5. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
6. Add marinated meat and cook until the meat is done.
7. Layer the partially cooked rice over the meat, drizzle saffron milk on top, and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
8. Garnish with fresh mint and cilantro before serving.

fields.name: Palak Paneer
fields.description: A popular vegetarian dish made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spiced spinach gravy.
fields.instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Add turmeric powder, chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook for 2 minutes.
5. Add the spinach puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
6. Add paneer cubes and cook for another 5 minutes.
7. Garnish with fresh cream before serving.
